# Notice: Service RFP: Senior Project Manager/Change Management Consultant

## Background

Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for a Senior Project Manager/Change Management Consultant to support the Greener Homes Division's (GHD) process improvement initiatives.

## Tender Details

* Tender Reference Number: cb-7102-21155865
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: NRCan-5000073716
* Tender Publish Date: Monday, July 10, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: Friday, August 18, 2023, at 2:00 pm (EST)
* Expected Contract Start Date: Monday, August 31, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: Wednesday, August 31, 2024

## Scope of Work

The successful candidate will be responsible for leading and implementing process improvements and change management to support the modernization of NRCan's EnerGuide program. Key objectives include:

* Supporting the establishment of steering committees for programmatic changes
* Leading project management initiatives to ensure alignment across projects
* Coordinating project intake and documentation
* Implementing tools and techniques to optimize project activities
* Overseeing change management processes
* Ensuring projects meet government and public sector security, IT, and other requirements

## Requirements and Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Technical Merit (30%)
* Price (70%)

## Implementation Structure

The successful candidate will work closely with the GHD management team to support the implementation of process improvements and change management. The candidate will also be responsible for developing and delivering training programs to internal and external stakeholders.

## Funding and Payment Terms

The contract will be funded through NRCan's internal budget. Payment terms will be based on the contract's terms and conditions.

## Contact Information

* Julia Pace, Contracting Officer
* Email: [julia.pace@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:julia.pace@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)
* Phone: (902) 719-4856
* Address: 1 Challenger Drive, Dartmouth, Nova Scotia B2Y 4A2, Canada

## Document and Tender Submission Details

The tender notice and supporting documents are available on the Canada Buys website. Proposals should be submitted electronically through the website.
